name: UIScribbleInteractionDelegate
desc: Methods for customizing or suppressing Scribble behavior within text input views.

items.name: func scribbleInteraction(UIScribbleInteraction, shouldBeginAt: CGPoint) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the delegate should allow writing at a specific location in the view.

items.name: func scribbleInteractionShouldDelayFocus(UIScribbleInteraction) -> Bool
items.desc: Tells the delegate to delay focusing the text input view.

items.name: func scribbleInteractionWillBeginWriting(UIScribbleInteraction)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the user begins writing in the view.

items.name: func scribbleInteractionDidFinishWriting(UIScribbleInteraction)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that the user stops writing in the view, after Scribble transcribes and enters the last word.
